comments.body: how about using filter with populate_source_vars() which is defined in lite/CMakeLists.txt

@terryheo
I need to do some special handling for the following test.
Some tests need to be skipped and some need to use different link options.
Is it good to use populate_source_vars() with complicated filter rule?
 
```
# We don't always have the delegate environment(e.g nnapi)
# So, skip this test.
#test_delegate_providers_test.cc

# The test which has main() function.
set(TEST_WITH_MAIN_LIST
  cpu_backend_gemm_test.cc
  cpu_backend_threadpool_test.cc
  eigen_support_test.cc
  kernel_util_test.cc
  optional_tensor_test.cc
  subgraph_test_util_test.cc
  test_util_test.cc
)
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@
# The tflite kernel test
set(TEST_LIST
  internal/averagepool_quantized_test.cc
  internal/batch_to_space_nd_test.cc
